    Description
    Microservlet

  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.microservlet used by com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.microservlet
    Class
    Description
    BaseMicroservletResponse
    Base class for response implementations.
    MicroservletError
    Describes an error.
    MicroservletRequest
    A microservlet request, with a specific response type given by MicroservletRequest.responseType().
    MicroservletRequestHandler
    Prepares MicroservletResponse when MicroservletRequestHandler.onRespond() is called.
    MicroservletRequestHandlingStatistics
    Statistics about a given request
    MicroservletResponse
    Interface for response implementations.
